channel.title: 'Perfect Ring' Question! URGENT!
channel.description: A 'Perfect Ring' has somehow been leaked among the community of my server. My server has over 2,700 registered accounts, and obviously this is very bad for the community. Is their anyway to stop players wielding a 'Perfect Ring'? Help would be vastly appreciated!

item.title: 'Perfect Ring' Question! URGENT!
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

just make it a player rights object for 2,700 players i thault you would know that

Read full topic

item.title: 'Perfect Ring' Question! URGENT!
item.dc:creator: @k3zzer k3zzer
item.description:
@k3zzer wrote:

I’m thinking i could possibly set it it to like, To wield perfect ring you need 130strength, And the max on my server is 99.
But i can’t find the appropriate code. Can anybody help me?
MSN: kezzer@fuck-off.org

Read full topic
